title: GATE 1: Validate Anomaly Detection vs Fixtures
description:
First AI validation gate. Verify anomaly detection tools work correctly with fixture data.

## Gate Criteria (Updated for Anomaly Approach)
- [ ] detect_anomalies finds ads with z_cpa > 2.0 (from fixture z-scores)
- [ ] detect_anomalies finds ads with z_roas < -2.0
- [ ] get_ontology correctly groups by ad_provider, store, ad_type
- [ ] run_rca identifies root causes for anomalous ads
- [ ] Agent can chain tools: data → anomalies → ontology → RCA

## Validation Process
1. Load fixture data (tl_ad_performance_prod.json)
2. Run detect_anomalies with threshold_sigma=2.0
3. Verify anomalies match ads with extreme z-scores in fixtures
4. Run get_ontology and verify dimensional breakdown
5. Run run_rca on top anomaly and verify root causes identified

## Pass Criteria
- Anomaly detection aligns with pre-computed z-scores in fixtures
- Ontology correctly aggregates by all supported dimensions
- RCA identifies at least one plausible root cause
- Full agent flow completes without errors

## Fail Action
Fix tool implementations before proceeding to Recommend Agent.

## Target Time
Jan 31, 21:30 IST
